00014 void uiMenu::displayUIMenu(const GLuint & tempImage)
00015 {
00016         //finding centre of screen
00017         int wc = width / 2; 
00018         int hc = height / 2;
00019         int d = 300; // half of width and height of UI screen
00020 
00021         glPushMatrix();
00022         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00023         glPushMatrix();
00024         glLoadIdentity();
00025         gluOrtho2D(0, width, 0, height);
00026         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00027         glLoadIdentity();
00028         
00029         //gl depth test disabled so hud draws correctly
00030         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST|GL_LIGHTING); 
00031         glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00032         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D); //need for tempImage
00033 
00034         // display menu image at screen centre
00035         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tempImage); 
00036         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00037                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
00038                 glVertex2f(wc - d, hc + d);
00039                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
00040                 glVertex2f(wc - d, hc - d);
00041                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
00042                 glVertex2f(wc + d, hc - d);
00043                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
00044                 glVertex2f(wc + d, hc + d);
00045         glEnd();
00046 
00047         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST|GL_LIGHTING);
00048 
00049         // Reset Perspective Projection
00050         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00051         glPopMatrix();
00052         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00053         glPopMatrix();
00054 }

00056 void uiMenu::mouseUIMenu(int button, int state, int x, int y)
00057 {
00058         //KM 15/10/2016 click noise - sourced from http://soundbible.com/1705-Click2.html
00059         CEasySound *es;
00060         CSound* clickSound;
00061         es = CEasySound::Instance();
00062         clickSound = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/Click2-Sebastian-759472264.wav"));
00063 
00064         //screen height and width centres
00065         int hc = height/2;
00066         int wc = width/2;
00067         int btnW = 190 / 2; // width of button, halved for calcs
00068         //fyi: button is 20px high and there is 60px between buttons
00069         
00070         //when click in pixel area of menu option make click sound and do expected action
00071         if (button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON && state == GLUT_UP)
00072         {
00073                 //will need to height-y to convert coords to match screen and mouse together

00078                 //restart: reset all variables to beginning state and uiMenu = false
00079                 if (x >= wc - btnW && x <= wc+btnW && y >= hc-100 && y <= hc - 75)
00080                 {
00081                         clickSound->Play();
00082                         
00083                         //reset game to starting variables
00084                         //timer = max

00086                         //player position = start
00087                         //balls = start

00089                         //restarts animation
00090                         //restarts timer
00091 
00092                         
00093 
00094                         //returns to game
00095                         gVar.uiMenu = false;
00096                 }
00097                 //resume: uiMenu = false, restarts animation and timer

00099                 {
00100                         clickSound->Play();
00101                         //restart animation
00102                         //restart timer
00103 
00104                         //returns to game
00105                         gVar.uiMenu = false;
00106                 }
00107                 //options: uiOptions = true
00108                 if (x >= wc - btnW && x <= wc + btnW && y >= hc +57 && y <= hc +77)
00109                 {
00110                         clickSound->Play();
00111                         gVar.uiOptions = true;
00112                         gVar.uiMenu = false;
00113                 }
00114                 //leaderboard: uiLeaderboard = true

00116                 {
00117                         clickSound->Play();

00119                         gVar.uiMenu = false;
00120                 }
